services.name: IT Asset Management Service
services.description: This service provides tools for tracking, managing, and optimizing IT assets within an organization, ensuring cost-effectiveness and operational efficiency. Users can register devices, perform inventory checks, and predict lifecycle stages.

services.name: System Monitoring and Diagnostics Service
services.description: This API enables organizations to monitor system health, receive notifications of emerging issues, and access tools for diagnosing root causes of failures, enhancing overall uptime and reliability.

services.name: User Authentication and Authorization Service
services.description: This service handles user authentication and role-based access control seamlessly for web and mobile applications, offering integration support and ensuring secure and efficient management.

services.name: Cloud Resource Provisioning Service
services.description: Users can deploy, scale, and manage cloud resources seamlessly through this API, optimizing application hosting and data storage operations in real time.

services.name: Data Analytics and Visualization Service
services.description: This service offers advanced analytical tools for processing, modeling, and visualizing datasets. It includes customizable dashboards to present actionable insights for informed decision-making.
